import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';const initialState={lan:localStorage.getItem('lan')};export const languageSlice=createSlice({name:'language',initialState,reducers:{italian:state=>{state.lan='it';localStorage.setItem('lan','it');},english:state=>{state.lan='en';localStorage.setItem('lan','en');},arabic:state=>{state.lan='ar';localStorage.setItem('lan','ar');}}});// Action creators are generated for each case reducer function
export const{italian,english,arabic}=languageSlice.actions;export default languageSlice.reducer;
